step1.question:
That’s lovely to hear😊 What’s been lifting your spirits today?
 Would you say your glad feeling today is connected to...

step2_task.question: That’s always a great feeling! 🤝 Was it a task you’d been working on for a while or a quick win that gave you a sense of progress?

step2_support.question: That’s so uplifting 🌟 What kind of appreciation or support did you receive — a kind word, a helpful action, or maybe a thoughtful message?

step2_conversation.question: Team interactions can make all the difference 🤝 What about this conversation or moment stood out for you?

step2_progress.question: Progress on work that matters feels so rewarding personal win, or something that brought clarity?

step2_learning.question: Growth always sparks energy!Was it about learning a new skill, being trusted with something new, or stepping into a fresh opportunity?

step2_balance.question: Balance is such a win What helped make your day feel smooth — fewer interruptions, managing time well, or just good headspace?

step2_culture.question: That’s wonderful to hear What part of the culture felt supportive today — teamwork, inclusion, flexibility, or just a positive vibe?

step2_growth.question: That’s inspiring  Was it a new responsibility, feedback you received, or something that reminded you you’re moving in the right direction?

step3.question: Do you feel like this experience had any impact on your work or mindset today?

step4.question: Even small moments can be worth acknowledging. Would you like to share this with someone — or keep it just for yourself for now?

step5_t.question: Would you like a message template to help you share this moment? You can edit it or write your own too.

step5_m.question: Would you like a message template to help you share this moment? You can edit it or write your own too.

step5_manager_suggested.question_edit: Hi [Manager’s Name], I just wanted to thank you for [support/recognition/feedback]. It really boosted my energy today and reminded me of the kind of growth I’m working toward.

step5_teammate_suggested.question_edit: “Hey [Name], just wanted to say — I really appreciated [something specific] today. It made my day lighter and reminded me how great our team can be.

messages: That’s so thoughtful of you to share this. Moments like these can really ripple out and brighten someone else’s day too.
Whether it’s a simple thank-you or a small note of recognition, it’s a lovely way to strengthen those positive connections.
Totally fair. Sometimes just taking a moment to pause and hold that feeling is enough. Glad you gave yourself this space — even a quiet win matters.

step7.question: Would you like to take this moment further in any way?

messages: Thanks for taking a moment to pause and reflect. Whether you chose to share it or simply held space for it, that matters.
You’re always welcome to check in again — whether it’s to share a win, work through something tough, or just breathe for a moment
Feel free to come back anytime during your day.
Take care, and talk to you soon!
— Your wellbeing chatbot

step1.question:
’m really sorry to hear you’re feeling low today.sometimes, and it’s okay to talk about it.
Everyone has tough days Can you tell me what’s weighing on you at work right now?

step2.question: Thanks for letting me know. Just so I can understand a bit better — how long have you been feeling this way?

step3_manager_related_challenges.question: That can be really tough.What kind of challenge are you facing with your manager right now?

step4_m.question:
If you had the space or support you needed right now — what do you think would help improve things, even a little?
I hear you — that can affect your day more than people realize. What kind of support or change from your manager would make things better for you?

step3_difficult_interactions_with_collea.question: I’m sorry you’re going through that.What’s been happening with your colleagues?

step4_c.question:
If you had the space or support you needed right now — what do you think would help improve things, even a little?
Relationships at work matter a lot. Is there anything you wish could change in how you and your colleaues work together?

step3_company_culture.question: That’s frustrating.What part of the culture or policy is affecting you?

step4_cc.question:
If you had the space or support you needed right now — what do you think would help improve things, even a little?
Thank you for sharing that. If something about the workplace culture or policies could shift, what would help you feel more supported?

step3_role_clarity.question: Feeling unsure about your role can be unsettling.What’s been unclear or confusing for you?

step4_rc.question:
If you had the space or support you needed right now — what do you think would help improve things, even a little?
That uncertainty can be draining. What kind of clarity or support would help you feel more grounded in your role?

step3_work_life_balance.question: Balance can be really hard to maintain. What’s making it difficult right now?

step4_w.question:
If you had the space or support you needed right now — what do you think would help improve things, even a little?
Balance can feel impossible at times — I hear you. What would help make things feel more manageable?

step3_emotional_exhaustion.question: That sounds heavy. What’s contributing to this feeling of burnout or stress?

step4_ee.question:
If you had the space or support you needed right now — what do you think would help improve things, even a little?
Feeling this way can be heavy. If you had just one small step of support, what do you think would help ease that feeling?

step3_workspace_tools_or_infrastructure_.question: Your environment impacts how you feel.What issues are you facing?

step4_wi.question:
If you had the space or support you needed right now — what do you think would help improve things, even a little?
Your work environment really does impact your energy. What kind of change would make your setup more comfortable or workable?

step5.question: Would you like to share how you’re feeling with someone — maybe a manager, a teammate, or even anonymously?

step5_t.question: Would you like a ready-to-use message template to help you express how you’re feeling? You can customize or write your own if you prefer

step5_m.question: “Would you like a ready-to-use message template to help you express how you’re feeling? You can customize or write your own if you prefer

step5_manager_suggested.question_edit: Hi [Manager's Name], I just wanted to share something I’ve been feeling lately. I’ve been going through a bit of a rough patch at work — mostly related to [issue]. I thought it might help to be open about it. I’m happy to talk more if and when you feel it’s a good time. Thanks for listening.

step5_teammate_suggested.question_edit: Hey [Colleague’s Name], I just wanted to share where I’m at lately. Work’s been a bit challenging for me, especially with [mention briefly]. I value our teamwork and just wanted to be honest with you. Thanks for understanding.

step5_custom.question_edit: I’d like to anonymously share that I’ve been struggling with [issue]. I hope this feedback helps make the workplace more supportive for myself and others. Thank you.

messages: Thanks for opening up today . What you’re feeling is valid, and taking time to acknowledge it is a powerful first step.
If you ever want to check in, vent, or just sit with your thoughts — I’m always here.
In the meantime, if you’d like to take a moment for yourself, here are a few small things might help you reset:
A short breathing exercise
Listening to a calming song
Chair yoga or a desk stretch
Taking a small break away from your screen
Talking to a friend or someone you trust
Take care of yourself, and talk to you soon.
— Your wellbeing chatbot

step1.question:
Sounds like you’re feeling frustrated or irritated right now.That’s completely valid — let’s talk about what’s been bothering you.
 What’s been causing that tension at work?

step2.question: Thanks for telling me that. How long have you been feeling this way?

step3_frustration_with_manager_or_leader.question: Leadership challenges can be incredibly frustrating. What’s been the core issue?

step4_f.question: When leadership doesn’t feel aligned or responsive, it can really drain morale. What kind of shift would help ease the pressure?

step3_tension_or_conflict_with_colleague.question: Tense team dynamics can really drain your energy. What’s been going on?

step4_tc.question: Workplace relationships can shape your whole day. What support would help make things smoother with your team?

step3_unfair_workload_or_lack_of_recogni.question: It can feel defeating when your effort isn’t seen or appreciated. What’s bothering you most?

step4_uw.question: When your work goes unrecognized or feels unfair, it’s hard to stay motivated. What change would feel supportive right now?

step3_missed_deadlines_or_miscommunicati.question: When things go off-track, it’s natural to feel irritated. What’s been causing that?

step4_md.question: When projects fall off track, it creates a lot of pressure. What would help things run more smoothly for you?

step3_frustration_with_company_policies_.question: Sometimes rules or systems can feel like obstacles. What kind of policy is frustrating you?

step4_fwc.question: Policies and processes are supposed to support us — not hold us back. What kind of change would make them more workable?

step3_feeling_stuck_or_blocked_in_work.question: Feeling stuck is frustrating — especially when you want to move forward. What’s getting in your way?

step4_fso.question: Feeling blocked can be incredibly demotivating. What kind of support would help you move forward again?

step3_too_much_change_or_unclear_directi.question: Too much change without clarity can be exhausting. What part of the shift has been most frustrating?

step4_cud.question: Constant change without direction can be exhausting. What would help you feel more anchored right now?

step3_infrastructure_or_facility_related.question: When the physical environment doesn’t support your work, it’s easy to feel irritated. What’s been the issue for you?

step4_iof.question: When your tools or environment don’t support your work, it can wear you down. What change would ease that friction?

step5.question:
Thanks for opening up. Sometimes it helps to share what you're feeling — whether to create change, or just feel seen.
Would you like to share this with someone — maybe your manager, a teammate, or anonymously?

step5_t.question: Would you like a ready-to-use message template to help express your frustration? You can edit or write your own.

step5_m.question: Would you like a ready-to-use message template to help express your frustration? You can edit or write your own.

step5_manager_suggested.question_edit: Hi [Manager's Name], I wanted to share something that’s been frustrating me recently at work. It’s related to [brief issue – e.g., workload / communication / tools], and I thought being open might help. I’d appreciate a chance to talk or reflect further whenever possible. Thanks for understanding.

step5_teammate_suggested.question_edit: Hey [Colleague's Name], I just wanted to be honest about something that’s been bothering me. Things have felt a bit frustrating around [mention briefly], and I wanted to share that with you so we can find better ground. Thanks for hearing me out.

step5_custom.question_edit: I’d like to anonymously share that I’ve been feeling frustrated about [brief issue]. I hope this helps bring attention to the experience and can lead to a smoother work environment. Thank you.

messages: Frustration is a real signal — and you taking time to acknowledge it is a powerful thing
If things still feel unsettled later, you’re always welcome to check back in.
Meanwhile, if you'd like a moment to reset, here are a few small ideas that might help ease the tension:
A short breathing or grounding exercise
Listening to music that helps you release the mood
A quick walk or break away from your screen
Talking it out with someone you trust
Jotting your thoughts down privately
Take care of yourself — and I’ll be here if you need to check in again.
— Your wellbeing chatbot
